name: Snap Bubble
description:
Simple to learn, difficult to master, this is the most addictive bubble game !
Just tap and hold the screen to charge and bounce the ball to match 3 or more of the same color, Clear all the balls before they move up to the top.

Features:
◉ Free to play
◉ 60 levels to unlock
◉ Challenging endless gameplay
◉ Simple ball control
◉ Challenge your friends with the best high score
